Home Page

Welcome!

Hello and thank you for visiting my site! I am an acoustic engineer and my main focuses are on real-time DSP, hardware development, and machine learning. Outside of these projects I love to play music and have released a couple of EPs on Spotify and other streaming platforms. Please take some time to look at some of my projects and if you ever want to talk about my work, please feel free to reach out via my contact information below!

Featured Projects

Acoustic Metamaterial-Enhanced Transducer

Design and validation of a novel acoustic metamaterial enabled transducer for heightened beamforming performance.

Read more about this project

Parabolic Wave Equation Solver

Computational model for acoustic radiation using an IFD class of solution to the parabolic wave equation.

Read more about this project

Real-time Video to Audio iOS app

Algorithm that uses pixel values from frames of videos to continuously generate audio.

Read more about this project

Training an AI to play the Palace Card Game

Training framework using PyTorch to train a neural net to play the card game ‘Palace’ against two other players.

Read more about this project
